element.short: Descriptive label for this element definition
element.definition: The term used by humans to refer to the data element.  Should ideally be unique within the context in which the data element is expected to be used.
element.comments: This may be similar to the question used to prompt someone for a data element value, but the purpose is communicating about the data element, not asking the question.  (Refer to the 'question' element for the latter.).
